content.raw:
I have problems using this plugin. When running this example, no collisions load. I have turned on the view->collisions for the actor on the picture below, and as you can see it’s completely empty. Any idea on why this is? I have installed gazebo together with ROS Melodic, but have downloaded the entire source including the example here from bitbucket. Thanks in advance!

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3675280633-Ubuntu18-2020-04-07-11-29-20.png)
‌
